faq_1_a: You pay one monthly fee regardless of how many domains you add (up to your plan limit). No per-domain charges or surprise bills.
faq_2_q: Can we white-label this for clients?
faq_2_a: Yes! Agency and Enterprise plans include full white-labeling. Your clients see your brand on setup instructions and status pages.
faq_3_q: What if a client uses an unsupported DNS provider?
faq_3_a: All DNS providers are supported. Clients just add a CNAME record—no API integration needed. Works with GoDaddy, Namecheap, Cloudflare, Route53, and hundreds more.
faq_4_a: Yes. Enterprise plans include 99.9% uptime SLA with financial credits for downtime. Contact sales for details.
faq_5_q: How quickly can certificates be issued?
faq_5_a: Most certificates issue within 5-10 minutes after DNS verification. Renewals happen automatically 30 days before expiration.
